about_the_game:
SYNOPSIS

You are trapped in a strange, dark place. Your goal is to collect bodies, get rid of them, and find a way out. But something scary is watching you, and the choices you make will change the ending of your story. Can you escape before it’s too late?

This horror game mixes creepy atmosphere with surprise scares that keep you on edge. The puzzles are simple to understand, but you’ll need to stay focused. As you solve them, be ready for moments of terror when you least expect them.

 KEY FEATURES

  • Different Endings: Your choices lead to different endings. Play again to see all the ways the story can end.

  • Puzzles: Solve puzzles that are easy to understand but add to the tension of the game.

  • Scary Atmosphere: Explore a dark, creepy world where everything makes you feel uneasy.

  • Jump Scares: Sudden scary moments will keep you alert.

  • Body Cam 3D Graphics: The game uses simple 3D graphics with a body cam effect, making you feel like you’re inside the game, adding tension to every movement.

  • Creepy Sound Effects: Sounds in the game make every moment feel scarier, like footsteps or whispers in the dark.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains depictions of corpses, severed body parts, and bloodstains as part of its horror elements. These visuals are designed to enhance the atmosphere of the game and are not intended to depict extreme violence or explicit gore.

While the game does not include themes such as sexual acts, non-consensual violence, or drug/alcohol abuse, players sensitive to the visual representation of death or mutilation may find some scenes unsettling. Viewer discretion is advised.

name: Recycling Factory

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10+ x64
  • Processor: Intel/AMD X64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 6GB or AMD equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: YES
  • Additional Notes: SSD strongly recommended for faster loading time. Turn off room lights and Put your headset on for best experience.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10+ x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4770K or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 2080 or AMD equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: YES
  • Additional Notes: SSD strongly recommended for faster loading time. Turn off room lights and Put your headset on for best experience.

short_description: Your goal in this horror game is simple: collect bodies, get rid of them, and find a way out. But in this dark place, everything is dangerous. Solve puzzles and escape the fear that surrounds you.
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Thai, Korean
